content: Erlang manages to catch up to Wukong and causes him to fall. And so, at the top of a mountain, Sun Wukong's story comes to an end and he's shown trapped inside of a rock.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Endings_Explained.md', within the main section titled 'Endings Explained', specifically from the subsection 'The Story So Far'.
The content is as follows:
Erlang manages to catch up to Wukong and causes him to fall. And so, at the top of a mountain, Sun Wukong's story comes to an end and he's shown trapped inside of a rock.
